td.content: s:patient c/o 7 weeks h/o mild diarrhea. NKDA. he is a 54 year old white m yodeler. o:Height 166 cm, Weight 65.1 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild tenderness to deep palpitation, HEENT: WNL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Severe Indigestion p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed famotidine - 40 mg daily, and ordered serum helicobacter pylori assay.
